note.p: Death: Northaw, Hertfordshire (between 23 December 1714 and 13 January 1715)
Editor Phil. Trans.: 1692-1696 (assisted by Edmond Halley, Hans Sloane and others)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; Hunter; NR
References: Charles A Rivington, 'Addendum. Early Printers to the Royal Society, 1663-1708' in NR 1985-86 vol 40 pp 219-220
Margaret J M Ezell, 'Richard Waller, SRS: "In the Pursuit of Nature"' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 215-233
J A Bennett, 'Wren's Last Building?' in NR 1972-3 vol 27 pp 107-118
L Jardine, 'The 2003 Wilkins Lecture: Dr Wilkins's boy wonders' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 107-129
S Kusukawa ' Picturing knowledge in the early Royal Society: the examples of Richard Waller and Henry Hunt ' NR 2011 vol 65 pp 273-294
